name: pneumatically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that uses air pressure: The pump is pneumatically driven. Pneumatically controlled doors allow the trains to enter and exit the building. See
pneumatic
More examplesFewer examplesThe brakes are controlled pneumatically, using a simple air-based system.Clamped in place pneumatically, the plate was rapidly shuttled across the retina of a digital camera.Emergency brake pressure is pneumatically controlled.
